df_angles[source]

df_angles(bone_f1, bone_f2, degrees=False, name='UN-NAMED BONE')

Compares the PCA angles between to bones.

Input: bone_f1 = bone in 1st position bone_f2 = bone in 2nd position

Returns: pandas dataframe
